pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Whip UV SPF Face Cream Moisturiser 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Whips Face Cream Moisturiser UV SPF 30 50g reduces wrinkles & firms skin without greasiness. Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Powerful wrinkle results without heaviness.


Features:
- Active moisturiser, advanced anti-ageing
- Controls shine & gives matte finish, even after 8 hours;
skin feels light & smooth all day long
- Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Powerful wrinkle results without heaviness
- In 2 weeks, skin is noticeably firmer - more elastic
In 4 weeks, significantly reduces lines and wrinkles
- Exclusive Active Rush Technology actively holds & releases 1000X its weight in hydration
- Uniquely whipped formula, with potent anti-ageing actives - - Advanced amino-peptide complex and carob fruit extract
- Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores
- Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Anti-ageing

Size: 50g

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• ADVANCED ANTI-AGEING
• Light as air finish all day long
• Controls shine & gives matte finish, even after 8 hours. Skin feels light & smooth all day long. Instantly hydrates & primes skin for all-day makeup wear
• In 2 weeks, skin is noticeably firmer - more elastic In 4 weeks, significantly reduces lines and wrinkles
• TECHNOLOGY
• Exclusive Active Rush Technology actively holds & releases 1000X its weight in hydration
• Uniquely whipped formula, with anti-ageing ingredients - ADVANCED AMINO-PEPTIDE COMPLEX + CAROB FRUIT EXTRACT Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores.
• Solar Sheer Technology TM SPF 30 BROAD SPECTRUM Advanced Anti-Ageing

Warnings

Avoid prolonged exposure in the sun. Wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear when exposed to the sun
Reapply product as often as necessary when exposed to the sun
For external use on unbroken skin only
Avoid contact with eyes
If contact occurs, rinse well with water
If skin irritation develops, discontinue use
Keep out of reach of children
Contains phenoxyethanol

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:
Homosalate 8% w/w,
Octocrylene 5% w/w,
Octyl salicylate 4% w/w,
Butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane 3% w/w;
PRESERVATIVES: Phenoxyethanol

Contains: Contains phenoxyethanol.

Directions

Smooth evenly over your cleansed face and neck every morning.

USAGE ADVICE

Reapply product as of as necessary when exposed to the sun.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: 30°C
